headline: Ask HN: Why not target the Russian oligarchs?
description:
If hackers or the international community want to really put the pressure on Russia, it seems they should pressure the people that stand to make the most money from this war/ Putins reign: His backers and cronys. Sanctions normally just hurt the poorer people of a country. The rich and the people in power are usually effected last. Why isn't this the stategy?

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_oligarch

Look at the Putin section.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么不针对俄罗斯的寡头？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼不針對俄羅斯的寡頭？
description_zh-Hans:
如果黑客或国际社会想真正对俄罗斯施加压力，他们似乎应该对那些从这场战争/普京统治中赚取最多钱的人施加压力：他的支持者和亲信。制裁通常只会伤害一个国家的穷人。富人和当权者通常最后才受到影响。为什么这不是战略呢？

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_oligarch

看看普京部分。
description_zh-Hant:
如果黑客或國際社會想真正對俄羅斯施加壓力，他們似乎應該對那些從這場戰爭/普京統治中賺取最多錢的人施加壓力：他的支持者和親信。制裁通常只會傷害一個國家的窮人。富人和當權者通常最後才受到影響。為什麼這不是戰略呢？

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_oligarch

看看普京部分。
